item.title: About

Feel free to reach out via LinkedIn or email. Iâ€™m happy to chat about health informatics, data analytics, AI in healthcare, or any innovative idea you have in mind.

ğŸ’¼ Experience #

Healthcare Data Analyst #

GTechnologies Pty Ltd
Aug 2024 â€“ May 2025

  • Developed and deployed a web-based Electronic Medical Records (EMR) system, significantly improving clinical data accessibility by 60%. Utilized a full-stack environment with MySQL, React.js, and Node.js for efficient data flow and user interface.
  • Standardized and structured clinical documentation through the implementation of ICD-11 coding in patient registration and pathology forms, enhancing record accuracy by 40%.
  • Optimized the EMR systemâ€™s internal search engine and resolved front-end/backend integration challenges, increasing platform efficiency by 50%.
  • Ensured patient data security, improved user navigation, and enhanced cross-functional interoperability between clinical departments.

Research Data Analyst #

Indiana University, IU BioHealth Informatics Research Centre
Sep 2023 â€“ May 2024

ğŸ“Š Projects #

Relation Between Healthcare Factors and Health Outcomes #

Technologies: Python, SQL

  • Explored global healthcare datasets to identify key disparities and patterns impacting life expectancy and health outcomes.
  • Connected SQL with Python for data cleaning, integration, and normalizationâ€”handling over 1 million rows.
  • Applied statistical tests (T-Test, Chi-Square) to validate hypotheses and built predictive models using Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, and Linear Regression, achieving up to 92.4% accuracy in health outcome prediction.
  • Developed visual dashboards with Tableau and created heatmaps to highlight factor correlations, providing policy-level insights to improve global health outcomes.

Pharmacist Participation in Diabetes Distress Assessment & Self-Management #

Technologies: Excel, SPSS, CRF (Case Report Form)
